Document.name: InvokeInMainThreadAndWait
Document.summary: Invoke a specified function with an specified argument in the main thread and wait for the function to complete or timeout.
Document.returns: Return true if the function complete. Return false if the function has not completed during a specified period of time.
Document.param: A window to access the corressponding main thread.
The specified period of time to wait. Set to -1 (default value) to wait forever until the function completed.
